articles.title: Drugs for heartburn, gout and depression now being tested as coronavirus treatments - Yahoo News
articles.description: The search for existing drugs that may help treat coronavirus infections now has researchers testing the heartburn drug Pepcid, among others.
articles.content:
The heartburn drug famotidine, the active ingredient in Pepcid, is one of roughly 20 existing drugs being tested as possible COVID-19 treatments. (Michele Eve Sandberg / EPA/Shutterstock)
